title: I didn't get a key fragment for over 100 matches
body: Any of you face this issue? For over one month, I didn't get any key fragment with over 100 matches. there are still 6 boxes in my inventory. I'm wondering it's tech bugs? or just force us to buy keys with moneyï¼Ÿ

replies.body:
The droprate for key fragments is more of a curve than it is a line. With each fragment you earn, the chances of earning the next is reduced. The droprate resets approximately 30 days after the first earned key fragment. It was designed this way so players who don't play as frequently still have a decent chance at getting key fragments. Check out our [Hextech Crafting FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) for complete details.

Let me know if you have any questions.
